description: Taco Tuesdays just got a lot more interesting with these prawn, avocado and coleslaw tacos.
name: Barbecue Prawn Tacos Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g large green banana prawns, peeled, deveined, tails intact

recipeInstructions.text: Juice 1 lime. Combine chilli powder, lime juice and oil in a large bowl. Add prawns and toss to coat.

Heat a greased barbecue plate on medium-high heat. Cook tortillas for 10 seconds each side or until golden. Transfer to a plate and cover to keep warm. Add prawns to the barbecue plate and cook for 2 minutes each side or until cooked through.

Prepare coleslaw according to packet instructions, reserving half the dressing. Top tortillas with slaw, avocado and prawns. Drizzle with remaining dressing. Cut remaining lime into wedges. Serve lime with tacos.
